resources.string: Thank you for completing the daily survey and contributing to COVID-19 research!

Welcome to the COVID-19 Sounds app, and thank you for your contribution.

Tap the button below to start the survey.

Please repeat this survey when prompted every couple of days by the app as repeated data allow us to follow the evolution of the disease". More information about the project is at covid-19-sounds.org and how we treat your data at covid-19-sounds.org/privacy.html

Thank you very much for contributing your data to the project.

We will send you a notification in a few days to prompt you to complete the questionnaire again.

For more information on the project, please visit the project website at covid-19-sounds.org

You can view our privacy policy at covid-19-sounds.org/privacy.html
